tech.tablesaw.api

Class BooleanColumn

  • java.lang.Object
    • tech.tablesaw.columns.AbstractColumn
      • tech.tablesaw.api.BooleanColumn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IntConvertibleColumn, Column, BooleanMapUtils

    public class BooleanColumn
extends AbstractColumn
implements BooleanMapUtils, IntConvertibleColumn
    A column in a base table that contains float values
